description: Try our easy to follow Chorizo, Prawn & Pea Pasta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chorizo, Prawn & Pea Pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add spaghetti, peas and reserved cooking water to pan with prawns and toss well. Season. Top with chorizo and parsley and serve.
